groups.name: EveryEvent
groups.description: Properties to track with every event.

properties.name: Url
properties.description: The URL of the page when the event was triggered.

groups.name: User
groups.description: The user that triggered the event.

properties.name: UserID
properties.description: The ID of the user that triggered the event.

properties.name: Role
properties.description: The role of the user that triggered the event.

groups.name: Team
groups.description: The team of the user that triggered the event.

properties.name: TeamID
properties.description: The ID of the team of the user that triggered the event.

properties.name: Plan
properties.description: The plan of the team of the user that triggered the event.
